nike.name: Air Force 1
nike.detail: Comfortable, durable and timeless: it's not number 1 for nothing. The cult design of the 80s, with several original details. A pleasure on the field as well as in everyday life.

nike.name: Nike Dunk Low
nike.detail: A low-profile sneaker with a classic aesthetic, perfect for casual wear and versatile styling.

nike.name: Nike Air Max 97
nike.detail: With its ripple-inspired design and full-length Max Air unit, this sneaker offers unmatched comfort and iconic style.

nike.name: Nike Blazer Mid '77
nike.detail: A vintage-inspired sneaker with a modern twist, combining style and comfort for everyday wear.

nike.name: Nike React Infinity Run
nike.detail: Designed for runners looking for maximum support and comfort, the React Infinity Run keeps you going mile after mile.

nike.name: Nike Pegasus Trail 3
nike.detail: Take your run off-road with the Pegasus Trail 3, offering exceptional grip and cushioning for rugged terrain.

nike.name: Nike Zoom Freak 4
nike.detail: Giannis Antetokounmpo's signature sneaker, designed for explosive play on the court.

nike.name: Nike Free RN Flyknit 5.0
nike.detail: Lightweight and flexible, the Nike Free RN Flyknit 5.0 is perfect for short runs and everyday wear.

adidas.name: Ultraboost
adidas.detail: Experience the ultimate in comfort and performance with the adidas Ultraboost. Featuring a responsive Boost midsole and a supportive Primeknit upper, it's perfect for running and everyday wear.

adidas.name: Adidas NMD_R1
adidas.detail: A street-ready sneaker with a sleek design and Boost cushioning, combining modern aesthetics with comfort.

adidas.name: Adidas Superstar
adidas.detail: An iconic sneaker with a classic shell-toe design, perfect for timeless street style.

adidas.name: Adidas Yeezy Boost 350
adidas.detail: Revolutionary comfort meets cutting-edge style in this modern sneaker with the signature Boost sole.

adidas.name: Adidas Forum Low
adidas.detail: A retro basketball sneaker with modern updates, perfect for casual wear and versatile styling.

adidas.name: Adidas ZX 2K Boost
adidas.detail: A futuristic sneaker combining ZX heritage with Boost comfort for all-day wear.

adidas.name: Adidas Terrex Free Hiker
adidas.detail: Perfect for outdoor adventures, offering a lightweight and responsive feel with rugged durability.

adidas.name: Adidas Gazelle
adidas.detail: A sleek and stylish low-top sneaker with a vintage-inspired design.

puma.name: Puma RS-X
puma.detail: The RS-X brings boldness to your sneaker game. Featuring exaggerated proportions and vibrant colorways, it's a perfect blend of retro and modern.

puma.name: Puma Suede Classic
puma.detail: A timeless classic, the Puma Suede combines premium materials with a sleek design for everyday style.

puma.name: Puma Future Rider
puma.detail: Lightweight and stylish, the Future Rider blends retro aesthetics with modern comfort for casual wear.

puma.name: Puma Cali
puma.detail: A California-inspired sneaker with a laid-back vibe, perfect for casual outfits.

puma.name: Puma Ignite Flash
puma.detail: Designed for runners, the Ignite Flash delivers responsive cushioning and a secure fit for high performance.

puma.name: Puma Cell Alien
puma.detail: Futuristic and bold, the Cell Alien features visible CELL cushioning for standout style and comfort.

puma.name: Puma RS-Fast
puma.detail: Fast-forward your style with the RS-Fast, blending retro running aesthetics with a modern edge.

puma.name: Puma Smash V2
puma.detail: A versatile sneaker with a clean design, perfect for everyday wear and casual occasions.

converse.name: Chuck Taylor All Star
converse.detail: The iconic Chuck Taylor All Star is a classic canvas sneaker that's perfect for any casual outfit. Timeless and versatile.

converse.name: Converse One Star
converse.detail: The Converse One Star brings a retro vibe with its signature star logo and low-top design, perfect for casual wear.

converse.name: Converse Chuck 70
converse.detail: A premium take on the classic Chuck Taylor, the Chuck 70 features enhanced materials and timeless style.

converse.name: Converse Run Star Hike
converse.detail: A bold and modern twist on the classic sneaker, featuring a chunky platform sole for elevated style.

converse.name: Converse Jack Purcell
converse.detail: Simple yet sophisticated, the Converse Jack Purcell delivers understated style and comfort.

converse.name: Converse Weapon CX
converse.detail: The Converse Weapon CX combines retro basketball-inspired design with modern comfort and bold aesthetics.

converse.name: Converse Chuck Taylor All Star Lift
converse.detail: A platform version of the classic Chuck Taylor, offering a boost in height and style.

converse.name: Converse All Star Pro BB
converse.detail: A high-performance basketball sneaker that combines classic style with cutting-edge technology.

reebok.name: Reebok Classic Leather
reebok.detail: The Reebok Classic Leather combines style with functionality. Its soft leather upper offers comfort, while the EVA midsole provides lightweight cushioning.

reebok.name: Reebok Club C 85
reebok.detail: A retro-inspired sneaker, the Club C 85 combines vintage styling with modern comfort for a laid-back look.

reebok.name: Reebok Nano X
reebok.detail: The Reebok Nano X is designed for performance. With a stable base and responsive cushioning, it's perfect for cross-training and high-intensity workouts.

reebok.name: Reebok Question Mid
reebok.detail: A classic basketball shoe, the Reebok Question Mid features a signature hexalite cushioning system and an iconic design.

reebok.name: Reebok Zig Kinetica
reebok.detail: The Zig Kinetica is designed for both style and comfort. Featuring a unique zig-zag sole and innovative cushioning, it's built to stand out.

reebok.name: Reebok Instapump Fury
reebok.detail: The Reebok Instapump Fury is a futuristic sneaker featuring a unique laceless design and pump technology for a customizable fit.

reebok.name: Reebok Classic Nylon
reebok.detail: The Reebok Classic Nylon offers a sleek, retro look with a breathable nylon upper and a cushioned midsole for comfort.

reebok.name: Reebok FuryLite
reebok.detail: The Reebok FuryLite is a lightweight sneaker that provides excellent flexibility and comfort, perfect for an active lifestyle.

new_balance.name: New Balance 574
new_balance.detail: The New Balance 574 is a classic sneaker that delivers both style and comfort. Its ENCAP midsole technology offers excellent support and durability.

new_balance.name: New Balance 990v5
new_balance.detail: The New Balance 990v5 is a high-performance sneaker that combines luxury, durability, and comfort with premium materials and advanced cushioning.

new_balance.name: New Balance 1080v11
new_balance.detail: The New Balance 1080v11 is engineered for long-distance runners, offering superb cushioning and support with Fresh Foam technology.

new_balance.name: New Balance 327
new_balance.detail: The New Balance 327 brings a retro-inspired silhouette with modern comfort. Featuring a unique design with a chunky sole, it stands out in both style and performance.

new_balance.name: New Balance Fresh Foam Hierro v6
new_balance.detail: The New Balance Fresh Foam Hierro v6 is designed for trail runners, featuring rugged durability and Fresh Foam cushioning for a comfortable ride on any terrain.

new_balance.name: New Balance 5740
new_balance.detail: The New Balance 5740 is a modern twist on the classic 574, offering enhanced comfort and a bold new look that makes a statement.

new_balance.name: New Balance 327 Sport
new_balance.detail: The New Balance 327 Sport offers a sport-inspired design with a lightweight and breathable mesh upper, offering all-day comfort and versatility.

new_balance.name: New Balance 1400
new_balance.detail: The New Balance 1400 is a sleek and stylish sneaker, offering a minimalistic design with premium cushioning for day-long comfort.
